## ⬇️ Installation & Upgrade

### For new users:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/nexoscreation/<repo-url>.git
cd <repo-url>
npm install
npm start
```

### For existing users:

```bash
git pull origin main
npm install
npm run build
```
